TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SignInRequestMessage extends System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationMessage

summary.span: 表示 WS-Federation Sign-In 请求消息。

span.span: Represents a WS-Federation Sign-In Request message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks WS 联合身份验证登录消息由信赖方（RP）发送到 security token service （STS）来请求安全令牌。A WS-Federation sign-in message is sent by a relying party (RP) to a security token service (STS) to request a security token. Wa 参数必须设置为 "wsignout1.0 1.0"，并且应将 wtrealm 参数设置为请求的资源的安全领域（这通常是所请求资源的 URL）。The wa parameter must be set to "wsignout1.0" and the wtrealm parameter should be set to the security realm of the requested resource (this is often the URL of the requested resource). 还可以在请求中指定其他可选参数。Other optional parameters may also be specified in the request. 消息是通过类的静态方法创建的 ，例如 方法，当 wa 参数设置为 "wsignin1.0 1.0" 时，不存在 wresult 或 wresultptr 参数，并且 wtrealm 参数或 wreply 参数存在。A message is created by the static methods of the class, for example the method, when the wa parameter is set to "wsignin1.0", there is no wresult or wresultptr parameter present, and either a wtrealm parameter or a wreply parameter is present. > [!IMPORTANT] > 为了向后兼容 Active Directory 联合身份验证服务（AD FS）版本1.0，Windows Identity Foundation （WIF）允许设置 wtrealm 参数或 wreply 参数（或两者），以便登录消息有效;但是，WS-FEDERATION 协议要求在登录请求中存在 wtrealm 参数。For backward compatibility with Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS) version 1.0, Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) allows either the wtrealm parameter or the wreply parameter to be set (or both) for a sign-in message to be valid; however, the WS-Federation protocol requires that the wtrealm parameter be present in a sign-in request. 在大多数情况下，应确保指定了 wtrealm 参数。In most scenarios, you should ensure that the wtrealm parameter is specified. 类公开几个可用于设置或访问单个消息参数的属性。The class exposes several properties that can be used to set or access individual message parameters. 还可以通过字典设置或访问这些参数 。These parameters can also be set or accessed through the dictionary. 例如，可以通过 属性或通过将 "wtrealm" 指定为字典的键来读取消息中的 wtrealm 参数 。For example, you can read the wtrealm parameter in the message either through the property or by specifying "wtrealm" as the key to the dictionary. [!INCLUDE[wif_wsfed_ref](~/includes/wif-wsfed-ref-md.md)] ## Examples [!code-csharp[WifSignInMessage#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifsigninmessage/cs/webapplication1/default.aspx.cs#2)]

summary.span: 支持向后兼容性的非标准消息创建。

span.span: Supports non-standard message creation for backward compatibility.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wa 消息参数（ 属性）初始化为 "wsignin1.0 1.0"。The wa message parameter (the property) is initialized to "wsignin1.0". 支持向后兼容性的非标准消息创建。Supports non-standard message creation for backward compatibility. 在典型情况下，必须指定 wtrealm message 参数。In the typical case, a wtrealm message parameter must be specified. 此构造函数只允许指定 wreply 消息参数，以便与 Active Directory 联合身份验证服务（AD FS）版本1.0 的向后兼容。This constructor allows only a wreply message parameter to be specified for backward compatibility with Active Directory Federation Service (AD FS) version 1.0.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ AuthenticationType { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.AuthenticationType : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置消息的 wauth 参数。

span.span: Gets or sets the wauth parameter of the message.
The authentication type.
This is specified as a URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wauth 参数类似于 WS-TRUST 中定义的 wst： AuthenticationType 元素。The wauth parameter is like the wst:AuthenticationType element defined in WS-Trust. 该值应设置为一个字符串，该字符串包含标识所使用的身份验证类型的 URI。The value should be set to a string that contains a URI that identifies the type of authentication that is used. Wauth 参数是可选的。The wauth parameter is optional. 将 属性设置为 `null` 或空字符串，以便从消息中删除 wauth 参数。Set the property to `null` or an empty string to remove the wauth parameter from the message.

exception.span: 设置完全无效的 URI 值的尝试发生。

span.span: An attempt to set a value that is not a valid, absolute URI occurs.

value.span: 在 UTC 中为 datetime 的字符串指定 wct 参数的值。

span.span: The value of the wct parameter specified as a datetime string in UTC.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wct 参数指定创建消息时的当前时间。The wct parameter specifies the current time at the instant that the message was created. Wct 参数是可选的。The wct parameter is optional. 设置为 属性 `null` 或空字符串，以便从消息中删除 wct 参数。Set to the property `null` or an empty string to remove the wct parameter from the message.

exception.span: 尝试设置无效事件字符串的值。

span.span: An attempt to set a value that is not a valid datetime string occurs.

span.span: Gets or sets the wfed parameter of the message.
The value of the wfed parameter.
This is specified as a URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wfed 参数指定消息的联合上下文。The wfed parameter specifies the federation context for the message. Wfed 参数是可选的。The wfed parameter is optional. 设置为 属性 `null` 或空字符串，以便从消息中删除 wfed 参数。Set to the property `null` or an empty string to remove the wfed parameter from the message.

member this.Freshness : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置消息的 wfresh 参数。

span.span: Gets or sets the wfresh parameter of the message.
The value of the wfresh parameter.

value.span: 这应该是表示作为字符串的整数。

span.span: This should be an integer represented as a string.

value.span: 他指定以分钟为单位的最大生存期是有效的身份验证。

span.span: It specifies the maximum age in minutes that the authentication is valid.

value.span: 零表发布标记前应提示用户。

span.span: Zero indicates that the user should be prompted before the token is issued.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wfresh 参数指示身份验证有效的最长时间（分钟）。The wfresh parameter indicates the maximum age in minutes that the authentication is valid. Wfresh 参数是可选的。The wfresh parameter is optional. 将 属性设置为 `null` 或空字符串，以便从消息中删除 wfresh 参数。Set the property to `null` or an empty string to remove the wfresh parameter from the message.

exception.span: 尝试设置一个不是整数的字符串表示形式的值。

span.span: An attempt to set a value that is not a string representation of an integer.

summary.span: 获取或设置消息的 whr 参数。

span.span: Gets or sets the whr parameter of the message.
The value of the whr parameter.
This is specified as a URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 瓦时参数标识用于请求的标识提供程序的安全领域。The whr parameter identifies the security realm of the identity provider to use for the request. 可以将其指定为要使用的 IP STS URL，或将其用作请求接收方理解的标识符。It can be specified as the URL of the IP-STS to use or as an identifier that is understood by the receiver of the request. 瓦时参数是可选的，将 属性设置为 `null` 或空字符串，以便从消息中删除 $ 里瓦参数。The whr parameter is optional Set the property to `null` or an empty string to remove the whr parameter from the message.

span.span: Gets or sets the wp parameter of the message.
The value of the wp parameter.
This is specified as a URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标识要用于请求的策略。Identifies the policy to be used for the request. 它通常适用于操作（wa 参数），但可能会导致更广泛的影响。It typically applies to the action (wa parameter), but may have broader implications. Wp 参数是可选的。The wp parameter is optional. 将 属性设置为 `null` 或空字符串，以便从消息中删除 wp 参数。Set the property to `null` or an empty string to remove the wp parameter from the message.

summary.span: 获取或设置消息的 wtrealm 参数。

span.span: Gets or sets the wtrealm parameter of the message.
The value of the wtrealm parameter.
This is specified as a URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wtrealm 参数指定请求的资源所属的安全领域。The wtrealm parameter specifies the security realm to which the requested resource belongs. 这通常是所请求资源的 URL。This is often the URL of the requested resource. > [!IMPORTANT] > 为了向后兼容 Active Directory 联合身份验证服务（AD FS）版本1.0，Windows Identity Foundation （WIF）允许设置 wtrealm 参数或 wreply 参数（或两者），以便登录消息有效;但是，WS-FEDERATION 协议要求在登录请求中存在 wtrealm 参数。For backward compatibility with Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS) version 1.0, Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) allows either the wtrealm parameter or the wreply parameter to be set (or both) for a sign-in message to be valid; however, the WS-Federation protocol requires that the wtrealm parameter be present in a sign-in request. 在大多数情况下，应确保指定了 wtrealm 参数。In most scenarios, you should ensure that the wtrealm parameter is specified. 将 属性设置为 `null` 或空字符串，以便从消息中删除 wtrealm 参数。Set the property to `null` or an empty string to remove the wtrealm parameter from the message.

exception.span: 设置完全无效的 URI 值的尝试发生。

span.span: An attempt to set a value that is not a valid, absolute URI occurs.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Reply { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Reply : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置消息的 wreply 参数。

span.span: Gets or sets the wreply parameter of the message.
The value of the wreply parameter.
This is specified as a URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含响应应定向到的 URI。Contains the URI to which responses should be directed. Wtrealm 参数通常用于指定此 URI。The wtrealm parameter is often used to specify this URI. 但在更复杂的情况下，可以使用 wtrealm 参数来指定请求的安全领域（例如，整个网站），wreply 参数可用于指定该领域内的特定资源，例如文档、页面或终结点。However, in more complex scenarios, the wtrealm parameter can be used to specify the security realm for the request, for example, the entire web site, and the wreply parameter can be used to specify a specific resource within that realm, for example, a document, page, or endpoint. Wreply 参数是可选的。The wreply parameter is optional. 将 属性设置为 `null` 或空字符串，以便从消息中删除 wreply 参数。Set the property to `null` or an empty string to remove the wreply parameter from the message. > [!IMPORTANT] > 为了向后兼容 Active Directory 联合身份验证服务（AD FS）版本1.0，Windows Identity Foundation （WIF）允许设置 wtrealm 参数或 wreply 参数（或两者），以便登录消息有效;但是，WS-FEDERATION 协议要求在登录请求中存在 wtrealm 参数。For backward compatibility with Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS) version 1.0, Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) allows either the wtrealm parameter or the wreply parameter to be set (or both) for a sign-in message to be valid; however, the WS-Federation protocol requires that the wtrealm parameter be present in a sign-in request. 在大多数情况下，应确保指定了 wtrealm 参数。In most scenarios, you should ensure that the wtrealm parameter is specified.

exception.span: 设置完全无效的 URI 值的尝试发生。

span.span: An attempt to set a value that is not a valid, absolute URI occurs.

summary.span: 获取或设置消息的 wreq 参数。

span.span: Gets or sets the wreq parameter of the message.
The value of the wreq parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wreq 参数使用 `` 如 WS 信任中所述的元素或完整请求消息来指定令牌请求。The wreq parameter specifies a token request using either a `` element or a full request message as described in WS-Trust. Wreq 参数是可选的。The wreq parameter is optional. 将 属性设置为 `null` 或空字符串，以便从消息中删除 wreq 参数。Set the property to `null` or an empty string to remove the wreq parameter from the message. 如果 指定了属性，则 不能指定属性。If the property is specified, the property cannot be specified.

Wreqptr 参数是可选的。The wreqptr parameter is optional. 将 属性设置为 `null` 或空字符串，以便从消息中删除 wreqptr 参数。Set the property to `null` or an empty string to remove the wreqptr parameter from the message. 如果 指定了属性，则 不能指定属性。If the property is specified, the property cannot be specified.

Wres 参数为旧参数。The wres parameter is a legacy parameter. 通常，改用 wtrealm 参数（ 属性）。Typically, the wtrealm parameter (the property) is used instead. Wres 参数是可选的。The wres parameter is optional. 将属性设置为 `null` 或空字符串，以便从消息中删除 wres 参数。Set to the property to `null` or an empty string to remove the wres parameter from the message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 为了向后兼容 Active Directory 联合身份验证服务（AD FS）版本1.0，Windows Identity Foundation （WIF）允许设置 wtrealm 参数或 wreply 参数（或两者），以便登录消息有效;但是，WS-FEDERATION 协议要求在登录请求中存在 wtrealm 参数。For backward compatibility with Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS) version 1.0, Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) allows either the wtrealm parameter or the wreply parameter to be set (or both) for a sign-in message to be valid; however, the WS-Federation protocol requires that the wtrealm parameter be present in a sign-in request. 在大多数情况下，应确保指定了 wtrealm 参数。In most scenarios, you should ensure that the wtrealm parameter is specified.
